info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 29 at 6:00PM MST until July 29 at 7:00PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR WEST CENTRAL MOHAVE COUNTY... At 600 PM MST, Heavy rain has ended near the Kingman area. However... areas of ponding water and road closures remain possible. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Kingman, New Kingman-Butler, Chloride, Windy Point Campground, Packsaddle Campground and Golden Valley. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 in Arizona between mile markers 46 and 58. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
